text: "Love Like Blood" is a 1985 song by English rock band Killing Joke and is the second single from their fifth studio album Night Time. It went to the top ten in the Netherlands, Belgium, New Zealand and went to number 16 in the United Kingdom. It was covered by Swedish alternative metal band Death by April in 2010. ==References== Category:1985 songs Category:Killing Joke songs Category:Icehouse (band) songs Category:Gothic rock songs
title: Love Like Blood (song)
